# Sermon Series Theme Layout

The sermon series theme layout displays the sermon series for your church.

## Import the Sermon Series Theme Layout

As we continue to develop Digital Church, we are updating our theme layouts regularly. In order to have the latest theme layout, however, you will need to manually import the theme layout into your website. You can download the latest theme layouts below:

### Download the Sermon Series Layout
<a target="_blank" href={ require("/downloads/theme-layout-sermon-series.zip").default } download>Download the Sermon Series Theme Layout</a>

### Download the Sermon Series Archive Layout
<a target="_blank" href={ require("/downloads/theme-layout-sermon-series-archive.zip").default } download>Download the Sermon Series Archive Theme Layout</a>
